html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Describe the span of some lists of vectors.
Determine whether a list of vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline] spans [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline].

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 4 videos totaling 24 minutes, plus some questions.
